content.question: A. Using information in the graph shown, compare the data trend from 2000 to 2015 for Latin America and the Caribbean to the trend shown for the world. B. Using the data for ONE of the regions shown in the graph, explain why the trend may have an effect on traditional agricultural practices. C. Using the information in the graph, explain how changes in grain yields may affect rural populations in countries in stage 2 of the demographic transition. D. Explain ONE limitation of the data in showing the types of agricultural practices used at the regional scale.
